org.wattdepot.server.http.api

Class DepositoryValuesServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.restlet.resource.Resource
      • org.restlet.resource.UniformResource
        • org.restlet.resource.ServerResource
          • org.wattdepot.server.http.api.WattDepotServerResource
            • org.wattdepot.server.http.api.DepositoryValuesServer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CsvDepositoryValuesServerResource, DepositoryValuesServerResource, GvizDepositoryValuesServerResource

    public class DepositoryValuesServer
extends WattDepotServerResource
    DepositoryValuesServer - Base class for handling the Depository values HTTP API ("/wattdepot/{org-id}/depository/{depository-id}/values/").
    Author:
    Yongwen Xu
